tasks.name: price_analysis
tasks.description: Fetch and analyze OHLC price data, volatility, and drawdowns.

tasks.name: options_liquidity_analysis
tasks.description: Investigate options flow and liquidity due to high volatility.

tasks.name: legal_analysis
tasks.description: Deep dive into identified legal risks.

evidence.claim: Volatility for TSLA over 20 days is 45.2%
Maximum drawdown for TSLA over 20 days is 12.5%
TSLA shows positive momentum with 15% gain over last 30 days
Cybertruck delivery milestone reached, positive market sentiment
evidence.raw_snippet: Tesla delivered first batch of Cybertrucks, analysts see strong demand signals

evidence.claim: China sales decline reported, potential regulatory concerns
evidence.raw_snippet: Tesla China sales down 8% month-over-month, facing increased local competition

evidence.claim: NHTSA investigation into Autopilot safety features identified potential red flags: regulatory scrutiny, legal risk
evidence.raw_snippet: NHTSA expands Autopilot investigation, potential recall implications

evidence.claim: TSLA P/E ratio of 65.3 suggests stock may be overvalued relative to earnings
Revenue growth of 18% YoY indicates strong business momentum
evidence.raw_snippet: Q1 revenue: $25.2B, up 18% YoY, beating estimates

evidence.claim: High put/call ratio of 1.8 indicates bearish sentiment in options market
evidence.raw_snippet: Put/call ratio: 1.8 (above 1.0 threshold), high open interest in $240-$250 puts

evidence.claim: Options liquidity is healthy with $2.5B daily volume
evidence.raw_snippet: Daily options volume: $2.5B, bid-ask spreads tight at 0.5%

evidence.claim: NHTSA investigation could result in recall affecting 2.1M vehicles
evidence.raw_snippet: NHTSA preliminary evaluation covers 2.1M vehicles, potential recall cost $500M-$1B

evidence.claim: Regulatory risk is elevated but manageable, company has strong legal team
evidence.raw_snippet: Tesla has successfully navigated similar investigations in past, strong compliance record

rationale.bull_case:
- Strong positive sentiment (0.15).
- TSLA shows positive momentum with 15% gain over last 30 days [ev_pric]
- Revenue growth of 18% YoY indicates strong business momentum [ev_fund]
- Options liquidity is healthy with $2.5B daily volume [ev_opti]
rationale.bear_case:
- Significant event/regulatory risk detected.
- High volatility risk (0.8).
- TSLA P/E ratio of 65.3 suggests stock may be overvalued relative to earnings [ev_fund]
- China sales decline reported, potential regulatory concerns [ev_news]
- NHTSA investigation into Autopilot safety features identified potential red flags: regulatory scrutiny, legal risk [ev_news]
- High put/call ratio of 1.8 indicates bearish sentiment in options market [ev_opti]
- NHTSA investigation could result in recall affecting 2.1M vehicles [ev_legal]
